NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 149? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {152} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {Carter-RyanOnline}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 63? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {60} from {Potter.com} to {AtkinsonExpress}, a flow of {45} from {AtkinsonExpress} to {Potter.com}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 90 and 109? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Potter.com to DuffyLLCOnline or from DuffyLLCOnline to Potter.com?
NC.A: The flow from {DuffyLLCOnline} to {Potter.com} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Garcia Global to Potter.com, from Potter.com to DuffyLLCOnline, or from Potter.com to AtkinsonExpress?
NC.A: The flow from {Garcia Global} to {Potter.com} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {DuffyLLCOnline}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {AtkinsonExpress} and {Carter-RyanOnline}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Carter-RyanOnline, Arc AtkinsonExpress, Arc DuffyLLCOnline, Arc Potter.com, Arc Garcia Global}.
